title.narrative: Helpdesk function Education and skills Afghanistan

description.narrative: The Sida Afghanistan Unit is responsible for implementing the results strategy for Sweden’s international development cooperation with Afghanistan 2014-2019 which prioritizes education, identifying greater access and completion rates for girls and boys to improved schooling as part of a long-term strategy to improve human rights, gender equality, peace and sustainable growth. To strengthen its knowledge in the education and training sector (including formal and informal skills development), Sida has linked five international core experts through a Help Desk Function on Education and Skills Development in Afghanistan, whose purpose is to provide short-term counseling and expert advice to the Sida Afghanistan Unit.The purpose and intended use of the Education and Skills development Help desk function of the Afghanistan unit has been to assist in providing short-term counselling and expert advice in the following areas: - Support in the preparations for advocacy and dialogue regarding education and skills in Afghanistan, such as analysis and writing memos. Advocacy and dialogue may involve any developmental issues in the education sector and/or skills development initiatives - Assist in the appraisal of projects/programs for skills development, vocational training and education, and assessment of contributions at country level - Provide analysis and input in the bilateral strategy process e.g. through data collection, recommendations, assist in program design and processes, technical support and analysis of socio-economic and educational indicators, including results of contributions - Provide advice on how to assess and promote quality issues in skills development initiatives and in the education sector in Afghanistan, including issues related to measurement and assessment of learning outcomes - Provide recommendations on aid modalities and their application in skills development, vocational training and the education sector in Afghanistan - Provide recommendations on donor coordination/harmonization in skills development initiatives and in the education sector in Afghanistan - Participate in follow up activities in connection to education, skills development and vocational training programs and projects in Afghanistan. Tasks include reviewing documentation and results reports, as well as gathering information of programme and project results.

Det svenska stödet till utbildning i Afghanistan utgår från ett holistiskt perspektiv avseende både formell och informell utbildning. Sverige betonar inkluderande undervisning, jämlikhet och utbildning av god kvalitet. För att utföra detta uppdrag på ett professionellt sätt med hög kvalitet, behöver Sida ingående kunskap inom en rad olika delområden när det gäller effektiva utbildningssystem, lärarutbildning, läroplansutveckling, alfabetisering med mera. Denna insats innebär att Sidas kunskaper och erfarenheter inom utbildningsområdet förstärks genom att knyta fem internationella experter med gott renommé till sig genom en helpdesk-funktion.

The Swedish support to education in Afghanistan is based on a holistic perspective to both formal and informal education. Sweden emphasizes inclusive education, equity and quality education. In order to carry out this assignment in a professional manner with high quality, Sida needs in-depth knowledge in a number of different areas related to efficient and functioning education systems, teacher training, curriculum development, literacy, and more. This contribution will strengthen Sida's knowledge and experience in the field of education by linking five international experts with good reputation through a help desk function.
